QuestData.Title: Ak'Zeloth
QuestData.Description: Since the last great war when the Burning Legion was defeated, I have searched for sources of demonic corruption in orc society. The collar you brought me confirms my fears.$B$BIt belongs to the Burning Blade.$B$BYour role in this tale is nearly complete, $n. Go to Far Watch Post, on the border of the Barrens to the west, and speak with my assistant, Ak'Zeloth. Pass on to him this information.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ak'Zeloth at Far Watch Post in the Northern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ak'Zeloth at Far Watch Post in the Northern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: This is not news to me. While I appreciate your efforts, the Burning Blade will have to wait. We have other matters to which we must attend.
